name: Light Plane
description:
Try the plane to fly between the pipes colors. But beware, the plane is very light and if you push a lot, the plane will go too high.

Get your achievements:
* ROOKIE
* SENIOR
* PILOT
* MASTER
* GOD

5 difficulty levels:
- Init
- Easy
- Middle
- Hard
- Expert

6 different colors:
- Yellow
- Pink
- Blue
- Verde
- Red
- Orange

Simple one touch game play that will keep you entertained for hours!
It’s a lot of fun, regardless of your age!



e9b058f19a
